Articles.Content: Hello! I am very new here, I just made this account today and I got KSP yesterday, anyways, my name is Albin Xavier (Not my real name) and I like wolves, house cats, the color blue.

Hi! Welcome aboard! I suggest you to watch Scott Manley's tutorials on youtube to get started on the game.

Also, I like rockets, space, and KSP!
I always wanted a cat... Oh and welcome!

Thanks for the warm welcome everyone! My achievements so far are I got a 200KM orbit with Kerbin (using Mechjeb) and then I de-orbited it and landed it 12 meters away from the launchpad. My other achievement is I got a space station core set up, with Mechjeb again.

Thanks for the warm welcome everyone! I can't seem to upload an avatar on here, though. Is there any way to orbit the Mun with Mechjeb?

Edited April 18, 2014 by Albin Xavier
Welcome, and prepare to lose your sanity.

Welcome, and prepare to lose your sanity.

That's not a very nice welcome!

Read the community rules!
With the help of the tutorial on the wiki, I got a Kethane probe in orbit around the Mun and I got Jedidiah, Bob, and Bill Kerman on the Mun

Well, better than me.

@Donterrio, It was meant in the way that KSP will cause you to lose sleep, over probes and other missions. No harm meant.
Welcome im new here but im more experienced with ksp! (i had it scence 0.19) but still welcome!
Is half of the biggest fuel tank in the game enough fuel to go to other planets? A few days ago I made a rocket to go anywhere, but I'm not sure about the fuel.
I think it depends on the engine. It may be enough to get to Duna, but I don't know.
Am I the only person who cares about the lives of my Kerbals? So far none of them have died, and I intend to keep that record.
Nah, plenty of us watch out for our little green friends. Can't let anyone in the pack fall behind right? lol
...And now I need to launch a rescue mission, Jedidiah and Bob Kerman are now stuck on the Mun, I decided to manually land it, and I destroyed the lander.
